languages.text: "Истинные цели еретиков нам, увы, неизвестны... однако нет ни малейших сомнений в том, что они преследуют зловещую и нечестивую цель, а значит, должны быть остановлены!"
"Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"
languages.original_text: "Истинные цели еретиков нам, увы, неизвестны... однако нет ни малейших сомнений в том, что они преследуют зловещую и нечестивую цель, а значит, должны быть остановлены!"

traits.locale_text: "Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"
"Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"
"Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"
"Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"
"Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"

languages.text: “很遗憾，我们并不清楚那群异端分子真正的目的……但毫无疑问，他们的举动肯定怀着邪恶的目的，我们必须加以制止！”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，我们并不清楚那群异端分子真正的目的……但毫无疑问，他们的举动肯定怀着邪恶的目的，我们必须加以制止！”

languages.text: «Desgraciadamente, desconocemos los verdaderos objetivos de los herejes... ¡pero no cabe la menor duda de que persiguen un objetivo siniestro y perverso, y, por tanto, deben ser detenidos!».
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"

traits.locale_text: «Desgraciadamente, desconocemos los verdaderos objetivos de los herejes... ¡pero no cabe la menor duda de que persiguen un objetivo siniestro y perverso, y, por tanto, deben ser detenidos!».

languages.text: 「残念ながら、異端者の真の目的は分かっていません...しかし、奴らが腹黒く、邪悪な目標を追求していることは疑うまでもありません。ですから、阻止せねばならないのです！」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、異端者の真の目的は分かっていません...しかし、奴らが腹黒く、邪悪な目標を追求していることは疑うまでもありません。ですから、阻止せねばならないのです！」

languages.text: « Malheureusement, nous ignorons leurs véritables objectifs... mais il ne fait aucun doute qu'ils ont quelque chose de bien précis en tête et qu'il faut les arrêter. »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, nous ignorons leurs véritables objectifs... mais il ne fait aucun doute qu'ils ont quelque chose de bien précis en tête et qu'il faut les arrêter. »

languages.text: "Leider kennen wir die wahren Ziele der Ketzer nicht ... aber es besteht kein Zweifel, dass sie ein finsteres und böses Ziel verfolgen und daher aufgehalten werden müssen!"
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we do not know the true objectives of the heretics... but there is nary a doubt that they are pursuing a sinister and wicked goal, and therefore must be stopped!"

traits.locale_text: "Leider kennen wir die wahren Ziele der Ketzer nicht ... aber es besteht kein Zweifel, dass sie ein finsteres und böses Ziel verfolgen und daher aufgehalten werden müssen!"
